sqlReaderQuery.value:
select *
from [dbo].[Agent]
where 1=1
and create_timestamp > cast('@{activity('Get FromDate HW').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' as datetime)
and create_timestamp <= cast('@{activity('Get ToDate Agent Table').output.firstRow.last_modified_date}' as datetime2)

select *
from [dbo].[Claim]
where 1=1
and LastUpdatedTimeStamp > '@{activity('Get FromDate HW').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and LastUpdatedTimeStamp <= cast('@{activity('Get ToDate DB').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedTimeStamp}' as datetime2)

activities.name: Copy Data from Branch to ADLS
